name: 6.10 "A Kiss Is Still a Kiss" Trivia Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: How old was Cliff in this episode?
questions.explanation:
39.

	Harry the Hat was working on cheating the bar like usual by counting and carrying on a conversation at the same time. He told Cliff, "You haven't aged in a day, how old are you?" Cliff said 39, and Harry started to count from 39 when he last left off on 28.

Tom Skerritt.

	Tom Skerritt was born in 1933 in Detroit, Michigan. He has appeared in over 40 films including "War Hunt", his first film in 1962, and "MASH".

questions.text: Why did Rebecca tell Evan to close his eyes?
options: She had a surprise for him.
She had on too much make-up.
questions.explanation:
She looked messy.

	When she said "Close your eyes", Woody closed his eyes thinking she meant him. She was messy because she had car trouble.

questions.text: What did some of the guys think about Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
She was a lesbian.

	Evan said they thought she was "a lady's lady". This was ironic that Evan would think that when it was Evan she had such a huge crush on.

questions.text: Who had a bad case of the hiccups?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Carla told him to put a bag over his head but he wouldn't do it. Finally after trying everything else, he told her to get the bag.

questions.text: Who couldn't get a date from an escort service?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	She hired a man named Ryan to go to the party with her but he had to cancel. Sam picked on her because she couldn't get a date from an escort service, but then he took her to the party.

questions.text: How long had Rebecca been "carrying a torch" for Evan Drake?
questions.explanation:
2 years.

	Rebecca said that "carrying a torch" was "a silly expression" but then said two years. Sam was amazed she hadn't been with a guy in two years.

questions.text: Who else did Rebecca kiss in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Sam told her that no woman could kiss that passionately and not have feelings behind it. To prove him wrong, she gave Frasier a big kiss, which started his hiccups up again.
